title: Was the Arab Empire better than the Ottoman Empire? - Quora

response.answer_text: definitely . You cannot compare the Ottoman Empire with the Arab Caliphates . The Arab caliphates created a new culture, a new golden age, a progress in knowledge and a new view of the world, so far the Islamic civilization that the Arab caliphate created exists now and is part our world. The period of the Arab Caliphates was a new chapter in history. The Ottomans are part of the civilization created by the Arab Caliphates.
